runs.comm: messes it up completely by spraying it really wide of the off stump, too wide for him to chase
pitches it up outside and Gambhir nearly spoons it on the full to short cover
driven firmly on the front foot and Nathan McCullum is absolutely brilliant at backward point
Gambhir steps down the track and goes for broke but Southee pitches it shorter and the shot only meets thin air
fires it full on the off stump and a booming straight drive finds mid-off
pace and bounce and excellent carry, clearly the pace was a bit too much for Gambhir as he tried to angle it away to the off side, the outside edge wasn't too far
taps it in front of the crease and Sehwag hurries him to go for the single, nice end to the over after the wide ball at the start
comes round the wicket, he goes for a powerful drive and gets a thick inside edge onto the pads
invites the uppish drive over the covers by pitching it full and Sehwag goes for the shot but the timing isn't perfect
now the timing's perfect, half volley asking to be slammed over mid-off and Sehwag gets the elevation and the ball zooms through the air
good comeback as he fires it on the blockhole, he digs it out to mid-off
holds the length back but it doesn't help the bowler as Sehwag plays a tennis-like forehand over mid-off, in fact it was wide of the fielder comfortably, not the best shot but effective enough
fires it full and he pushes it just wide of mid-off
strays on the pads and he shuffles across and glances it fine
tip and run, good thinking by Gambhir as he sets off for a quick single to the off side
goes for a wild flat-batted whack and the elevation is just enough to beat Vettori at mid-off who leaps up to pull off a one-handed blinder, looked like Sehwag was trying to swat a mosquito
good comeback, he fires in a bouncer and keeps the batsman quiet
directs a short of a length ball on the body and he whips it high over square leg, fine leg runs across in despair
take that! He seizes another short ball and pulls this with more control, the ball lands just inches short of the deep square-leg rope
Gambhir tries to whack that into the pacific ocean, makes room to swing and misses it completely
pushes it to the off side

Sehwag's fun ends! O'Brien delivers from wide of the crease and pitches it up, Sehwag goes for the bait but his bat turns at the point of contact and as a result he ends up splicing it to Vettori at mid-off, for more description wait for O'Brien's blog later today
digs out a yorker to mid-off
taps it to the packed off side field, Vettori's attacking
just holds the length back on the off stump and he mistimes the punch back to the bowler
Gambhir greets Butler with an exquisite pull, bangs it in short on the body and he swivels and gets enough elevation to clear square leg
just a little fuller and he pushes it back to the bowler off his pads

another Indian batsman gives away his wicket, Butler bangs it in short and Raina tries to pull it over mid-on, there was a lot of bat speed on that one but the ball hit the top half of the bat and spliced to Southee who jumps and takes it at mid-on, it was a lot like Alastair Cook's dismissal in Kingston
gets back and pushes it back to the bowler
fullish outside off and pushes it to point
dabs it down to short third man and they scamper through for the single
comes over the wicket and bends his back, the ball fizzes past Yuvraj as he tries to pull
simply exquisite, Yuvraj stays at the crease and effortlessly scoops a half volley over mid-off, the follow through was excellent
holds the length back and he taps it back down the pitch
keeps it straight on the off stump, he pushes it back to the bowler
toys with the bowler by giving himself room before delivery, O'Brien errs by following him and pitching it up, enough for Yuvraj to mow it past mid-on
false shot but safe, he stays at the crease and tries to swing him for a six over long-on but he mis-hits it, the ball lands safe on the outfield and Oram does his best to get to it

oh well another poor shot, Butler pitches it outside off and gets it to move away, Gambhir stays rooted to the crease and tries to dab it away to third man but succeeds in getting a thick edge to the keeper, no foot movement whatsoever, it's New Zealand's evening so far

nearly a fourth wicket! Dhoni taps it to mid-off and the non-striker's way out of his crease, he gives up trying to get back but Vettori misses the stumps by a mile, that's a lifeline for Yuvraj, there's an overthrow

Dropped Yuvraj pulls and the ball is skied to Broom at deep square-leg, he's just inches before the rope as he tries to catch it but the ball drops out, worse still his foot touches the rope and it's a six
fires that outside off and Yuvraj swings and misses
lands outside off and he slashes it to the deep on the off side
floats it on the off stump, he taps it in front of cover and sets off quickly
steps down the pitch but adjusts his shot and clips it down to short fine-leg
beats him with a quicker one very nearly an edge
fullish on middle and pushes it to midwicket
gets on the backfoot and punches this one firmly down to long-on
oh well that was close, Dhoni gets a thick inside edge and they pick up a quick single, had the throw gone to the bowler's end Dhoni would have been in lots of trouble
steps down the pitch and nudges it to the on side
steps down, checks his shot and slashes it hard down to backward point
clips it towards square leg and there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but Yuvraj's safe
tries to drive but misses, McCullum is up to the stumps
beaten on the drive again, Ryder's getting the ball to skid through quickly
fuller in length and Dhoni drives hard towards mid-off

Run-out chance! He gets a leading edge towards short cover and scrambles back to his crease, Nathan McCullum dives and underarms the ball to his brother but Yuvraj stretches every muscle and makes his ground
pushes it to the off side
tries to punch it through the off side but the ball skids through and beats him
Dhoni's struggling to get a measure of this pitch as he makes room to cut and misses
stays back and punches it down to point
clips it to the on side for a single
continues over the wicket, he stays at the crease and angles the shot wide of point
comes on quick and cramps him for room, he edges it on the pad
goes for a wild across the line swipe but he gets a thick under edge past the stumps and short fine leg, not the best boundary of the evening
pushes it to mid-off and the fielder strikes the stumps at the bowler's end but there's nobody to back the deflection off the stumps
stays back and punches it to the off side
fullish on the pads and he clips it down to long-on
pushed down the track
into the stands! That was a massive slog, he gets on his knee to a flighted ball and the ball sails plenty of rows back over deep mkdwicket
and another! Can we have the ball back please! This time Vettori flights it outside off, he reaches out and scoops it over deep extra cover, that also went quite a few rows back
pushes it to long-on
clips it down the track
pushes it back to the bowler
fires it wide outside off and he digs it out
Yuvraj brings up his fifty with a blast! O'Brien bowls him a friendly full toss on the off stump and he swings him high over wide long-on, everyone take cover
fires it full outside off and keeps him quiet this time

Oram pulls it off just before the rope, O'Brien fires it outside off from wide of the crease and Yuvraj plays a front foot scoop over extra cover, Oram's there and he looks back to see it he's safe from  the rope
pushes a full delivery past the bowler
the extra bounce catches Yusuf by surprise but he does well to fend it off
nudged off the pads to the on side
another one bites the dust, Vettori lands it just outside off and cramps Yusuf for room, he tries to dab it away down to third man but gets a tame inside edge onto his stumps, wrong choice of shot
flighted on middle and off, he taps it back to the bowler

he's beaten on the off side drive and McCullum whips off the bails and he's really confident of the stumping, the third umpire takes a look, Jadeja just drags his foot back and there's a chance a part of his boot was behind the line, tough call and Jadeja lives to fight another day
gets on the front foot and drives to midwicket
the ball skids through and he drives to the off side and struggles to find the gap
full on middle and off, he drives to short cover
holds the length back and he;s beaten for extra pace as he tries to drive
slices it towards backward point and a fumble by Nathan McCullum allows a single
it's overpitched but Dhoni fails to get underneath the ball to scoop it away, he takes a single to long-off
outside off and pushed to point
goes for a wild swing but he mistimes the loft towards mid-on
backs away to swing it over the on side but he meet thin air
Jadeja mistimes a flat-batted swat and he just does enough to clear Oram at deepish mid-on, he throws himself backwards to attempt a stunning catch
mows it past the bowler on the up, Oram runs across from long-on and mops up
makes room and slices it down to deep extra cover
and finally Dhoni breaks the shackles, he gets a nice short delivery which sits up and he swings it away past midwicket, that should make him feel a lot better
makes room and nearly fetches another boundary, Oram does really well to sprint from long-off and cut it off
overpitched on the off stump and he stays at the crease and scoops him just over long-off, Guptill flings himself backwards but the ball beats him
comes back well with a yorker and Jadeja does well enough to dig it out to the off side
full outside off and dug out to the off side
gets a half volley on the off stump and Jadeja does well to make enough room and slay it over deep point, he plays with an angled bat and gets the elevation
Jadeja tries to take him downtown again but the loft it mistimed, he doesn't get the desired elevation and Guptill has a fairly easy take at long-off
full outside off and dug out to the off side
fires it on the blockhole, he makes room and mows it down to long-on
good stuff from Ryder, limits him to a dot ball to the off side
makes room and slices him the covers
tries to slam him down the ground but the timing's all wrong, Dhoni's not quite at his best
bowls it full and Irfan fails to get underneath it, he taps it down to cover
makes room to swing him over the on side but he gets an inside edge to short fine leg
makes room and pushes him down to long-off
swings it ion late and he makes room and chops him down to point
keeps it on the blockhole but he does much better to get underneath it and push it hard down to deep cover
full on the pads and worked to the on side
it's a friendly full toss and he can only tamely swing it down to mid-off, the throw is flat and quick but Southee fails to gather it quickly enough to whip off the bails
full on the off stump, he pushes it back to the bowler and Irfan is  way out of his crease, he scampers back but Southee decides against taking aim at the stumps
punches it hard to long-off
fires it on the blockhole and he turns the face of the bat and flicks it down to deep square-leg
he clubs a full toss off the meat of the bat and the ball travels quickly to deep midwicket, Broom sprints and gets a hand to the ball but he can only palm it away to the rope
slogs it away to deep midwicket
Dropped Mistimes the loft over the bowler's head and Guptill runs across from long-on and cups it over his head and drops it, it was a terrific effort though
he finishes the innings in style, he gets a half volley on middle and leg and he makes a bit of room and slogs him a few rows back over deep midwicket
